com.krobothsoftware.commons.network

Class CookieManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krobothsoftware.commons.network.CookieManager

  • public class CookieManager
extends Object
    CookieManager stores, and sends HTTP Cookies through HttpURLConnection.
    Since:
    Nov 25 2012
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Kyle Kroboth

      • putCookieList

        public void putCookieList(List<Cookie> cookieList)
        Stores cookies which are giving in a list. Any duplicate cookies will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        cookieList - Cookie list

      • putCookie

        public void putCookie(Cookie cookie)
        Stores an individual cookie. Will replace if is duplicate.
        Parameters:
        cookie - Cookie
